Dump MS ACCESS Database To Csv Files

Source: R/db-export.R
dump_access_db.Rd

for exporting tables and queries from MS ACCESS DB into .csv files (one for each table/query) into subfolder "qmra-db_accdb"

dump_access_db(
  db_path = default_access_db(),
  target_dir = default_target_dir(db_path),
  dbg = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

db_path

path to MS Access DB (default: default_access_db())
target_dir

directory. By default a new directory is created in the same directory as mdb resides in. The new directory has the same name as the database file with dots substituted with underscores (default: default_target_dir())
dbg

debug information (default: TRUE)
...

additional arguments passed to kwb.db::dumpDatabase()

Contents

Developed by Michael Rustler, Patrick Smeets, .
